website_summaries.verdict: A great travel toiletry bag that folds flat, but its storage capacity isn't as large as some of the others.
cons: The bag doesn't offer as much storage space as you'd think based on its size

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: So, I have used this twice now. I'm a very efficient packer. Two positives: it is well built and the zippers are very good quality. It does lay flat in your suitcase. However, this was not designed with women in mind. The compartments are not designed for any kind of cosmetics or for keeping your items organized well. And be mindful it only likes travel sizes. Don't try to pack any items larger than that. Fine for a weekend outing, not for a real 5-7 day or more trip.
customer_reviews.author: Hike Girl

customer_reviews.title: Was PLEASANTLY shocked that it holds so much
customer_reviews.text: With all the little pockets and however they designed it I’m so happy and surprised all my normal sized items fit (for the most part, pushing it with big shampoo and conditioner).
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Sad, as we love the concept and quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: Compartments are way too small. I have 3 must travel items, mouth guard , an disk inhaler, etc ... and these items truly have no home in this at all. Side pockets are too small and the main section, once you put a few pill bottles in there, cannot accommodate these other things. I bought two of these and had to return them both for my spouse and I. Sad, as we love the concept and quality of the item. I'd say if you have a small amount of items to go in this.. it might be ideal for you only.
customer_reviews.author: Robarino

customer_reviews.title: The best toiletry kit I've ever found.
customer_reviews.text: I am a frequent flier and these kits make packing a breeze. They hold SO MUCH and lie flat at the bottom of my suitcase with my shoes. Most toiletry cases are thicker and take up much more space. These hold enough toiletries and cosmetics for an extended stay. I like that there are so many separate compartments, and that some are waterproof so I don't have to worry about spills. It opens up fully so that I can see everything that I have. I leave one fully packed for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi B.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, better pricing available.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bag a lot. Just not $30 worth. So I had decided to return and use a bag I already had. Then a couple of weeks later eBags sent a $10/10 code and I had $5 in eBags bucks. Considering the bag was already a few dollars cheaper on eBags, these discounts made it a $10 bag. Absolutely worth it in my opinion. My Motherlode backpack ended up being significantly cheaper on eBags as well. If you are considering any eBags products it would be wise to price check there and to make sure you are signed up for their emails.
customer_reviews.author: april d fieno

customer_reviews.title: This bag changed my life.
customer_reviews.text: This bag changed the way I think about packing toiletries. It organizes all of my bathroom stuff extremely elegantly and efficiently...and it hangs on just about any coat hook! What's better: this thing can literally just plop right on top of all of your clothes. Toiletries used to be the bane of my existence whenever I packed (every week) until I got this. It is pretty hard to *not* find a place to put this thing. It's incredible; one of the best $30 I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos O. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: The internet always makes these things look bigger and more functional than it actually is. Great if your a minimalist and travel light but as hard as I try, that's just not me. I did much better on my last trip but this was not worth the purchase for me. I read so many great reviews and I trusted them. Great for some but too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Packs Efficiently, Less is More!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when this arrived, but after downsizing toiletries to 2oz bottles and jars (purchased on Amazon for shampoo, conditioner, moisturizer, hair finishing products), and really evaluating everything I packed, I was very pleased with the functionality of this kit. All of my makeup fit in the larger outside zipper pouch. Used it on a week long trip to Mexico, hung it in the shared bathroom and had everything at my fingertips. The total length of the toiletry kit is exactly the width of my carry-on and it packed flat on right top of my clothes. Will be leaving for a two week tour of Ireland soon and look forward to putting it back in use!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several organizers for travel and this one tops them all. It truly stores flat and has several compartments in it for various items. The purple is a pretty shade, not too loud and not too soft. This is a perfect travel case for a cruise or any other trip with limit space. It's compact but holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nick1177

customer_reviews.title: I love eBags travel packing cubes and envelopes
customer_reviews.text: I love eBags travel packing cubes and envelopes...so I thought this would be a great addition. It is WAY too small. Maybe good for a guy, but not for a woman. Even then, I think it is too pricey for what you get. The ends have zippered pockets that works for toothbrush / paste, small-sized hair products - shampoo / conditioners. The middle section doesn't have enough room for facial products, soap...no room for a comb or brush. LL.Bean has a much better selection in larger sizes and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice if you use only carry-on luggage
customer_reviews.text: Truly flat compared to any other toiletry kit. Good capacity because it's very wide. Good fit for a standard-sized roll-aboard bag. The largest compartments could use a little more subdividing, for carry-on traveler who tends to pack lots of small items instead of a few medium ones. Not suited for someone who brings a lot of full-sized toiletries in a large checked suitcase. Hanging hook is oddly small, for no clear reason.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Contorer

customer_reviews.title: EBag Pack-It-Flat Hanging Toiletry Kit
customer_reviews.text: EBags are amazing and have totally changed the way I pack when I travel. The Pack-it-Flat Hanging Toiletry kit is great and I’ve used mine for years. It has a lot of zippered pockets and slots inside for keeping cosmetics, medicines, toiletries, you name it - there’s room for everything in this bag. I purchased a black one for a Christmas present for a friend who travels a lot and they loved it. And it opens and hangs from a hook so all your things are right there when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, lays flat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! The only thing I would change is to add separate or more pockets on the interior. It lays flat in your travel bag which makes life so wonderful not having to cram an akward square into your suitcase. It holds a ton of stuff, all of my medicine, shower stuff, toothbrush, toothpaste, mouthwash, etc. Travel size bottles fit perfectly. I would highly recommend whether travelling overnight or for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Slim toiletry kit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a slim toiletry kit for a trip and had been looking at this one for a while. The PackIt Flat comes in this size and a large size. I was planning on taking small sized bottles versus regular sized. They fit well in this case. It has three pockets on the sides and one large pouch in the center with dividers and a zipper section on the flap. This bag will work well for my needs, however I may buy the larger one for when I want to bring larger products.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: Hang your stuff! This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the hanging feature. When I'm traveling with family, there just isn't enough counter space for everyone's stuff, so I figured maybe if I hang my toiletries, I could keep them all in one spot, right there in the bathroom, and easily accessible. Bingo! Great success. Although I might have preferred another zippered or clear small pocket or two, I was able to get all of my bathroom stuff in this and it worked very well. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cincymagic

customer_reviews.title: A ton of space
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a toiletry bag that held a lot of items but wasn't too bulky. I bought and tried four different bags and I am amazed how much room this bag has. Looks are deceiving because I thought there is no way all my items for a 8 day trip would fit, but they did. The best part about the bag is that it lays flat in your suitcase so it is not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure this would be a good fit for my travel style, but it turned out to work, and work well. It’s sturdy and well-made. Only one thought — the hangup hook area should be stiffer, as it sort of collapses when you use the hook to hang it. So I just hang on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jean Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I must have a dozen or more toiletry kits that just don't cut it when traveling. This toiletry kit is perfect! I can get all of my makeup and toiletry items in this bag and it is still slim, almost flat in my suitcase. It is not bulky and easy to carry. Since I don't like to check bags when flying it was important to have a toiletry kit that didn't take up a lot of room. Well, this is the one. Highly recommend this toiletry kit especially for travelers.
customer_reviews.author: FataL

customer_reviews.title: I waited to buy this...don’t wait just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love travel bags and gadgets but always turned my nose up at this product when I saw it. Finally I brought one and I am so glad I did! You can fit an amazing amount of stuff in this little guy and it folds up so neat and tidy! I packed two weeks worth of toiletries, hair product, and makeup in this and had plenty of room. I was organized the whole time with the four tall compartments on the ends and the big in the center. I have no cons!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lakaar

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and organized
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size bag. I did not store my “liquids” in here, but it fit deodorant, hair brush, hair supplies, tooth brush/paste/floss, makeup, many just in case medicines, make up remover wipes, and more and packed it nice and flat and kept it organized for me. I found it to be a good size. For me, it would work for any length trip. We went for a week to the Caribbean, and I used the shower supplies there. When I go to Europe, I’ll pack the shower supplies elsewhere in a ziplock, as we only do carryon, and this doesn’t work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I thought that it was a little big. I decided to hang it up and try it. Turns out, I love it! I can see everything, it is flatter and will pack better than my cube zippered bag that I am using now. This is also flexible and I can fold it in half in my suitcase if I need to. All toiletries have their special place an I'm excited to use it on vacation this week!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and is flat
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit most of what I need to travel in this bag. I do wish I would have purchased the slightly larger one but I can make this work. This bag does fold up and zip flat for packing. The material is great and the zippers are of superb quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not Large Enough!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was supposed to be a LARGE toilette kit but when I got it, I was thinking”am I the only person who’s thinking I obviously have a LOT more toiletries than anyone else who might use this Hangup bag? I wouldn’t be able to put half of my bathroom things in here!! Doesn’t seem big enough for everything I have! It seems very classy but still not big enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Sunflower!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Took this light weight kit on a Danube River Cruise recently and it was the perfect solution to limited space in the tiny bathroom. While I didn't actually hang the kit up, I found it so useful to pack my toiletries in the kit - put the kit on shelf - and I had everything at my fingertips. It is extremely well made, too.
customer_reviews.author: CVee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item but after a few uses it has broken. The zipper no longer works and is falling apart. I give it a "do not purchase" rating for durability. If you don't mind throwing away money then go ahead and buy it but otherwise look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Lopez

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself a year ago. I loved it so much that I bought one for my husband and daughter. You won't believe how much it holds and it's easy to pack. I went from using three separate travel pieces to only this one. I would highly recommend this to anyone who travels.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Murray

customer_reviews.title: Small Capacity
customer_reviews.text: I would have expected this bag to be much larger for the price. As it is you can fit a toothbrush, toothpaste, comb and perhaps some make up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Size and capacity very different than description. All those reviewers who said it was too small were right. If I only had the few toiletry items that would fit in this bag, I wouldn’t even need one. The bag itself takes up more room than its contents. It’s on its way back. Extremely disappointed. I’m returning to my original (and much more economical) solution of using zipper plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Perez

customer_reviews.title: It is bigger than described.
customer_reviews.text: I really researched a new travel toiletry bag and loved the 'flat' but even flat it is big. I chose another one with less width and slightly more height in favor of this one. Just didn't work for me. Too wide to easily hang in bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: travelngo

customer_reviews.title: It's not huge but I love it
customer_reviews.text: If I had to put a bunch of creams, makeup, and hair tools in this it would be way too small. It's great for the essentials and you can hang it up on a hook (which I've found is crazy useful) it also has a little mirror and several compartments sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Best Toiletry Kit I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I was able to consolidate four small travel bags into this one toiletry kit. I do not wear very much makeup. I absolutely love it. It lies very flat in my suitcase which I like a lot. The center portion is not as deep as the side compartments but I was able to pack what I wanted in it including a hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Portable bathroom cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Really well constructed with many pockets to help with organization. Zippers are smooth, seams are strong, and fabric is durable, though lightweight, and seems to be water repellent. Super easy to find items. No more fishing around to find loose toiletries as they are all right there. Especially convenient if you can hang it on a hook during your stay. It's like having a traveling bathroom cabinet, everything in its place wherever you go. I'm taking mine on a four-day river trip, and will hang on a tree. :-)
customer_reviews.author: C Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Not what it looks like in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of money. It looks nothing like what was pictured. Would be good for an overnight stay no way would you be able to fit enough stuff for a week. I will probably have to purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Toiletries Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a ton and have used every kind of bag possible. This toiletry bag is by far my favorite! It holds a ton and packs really nicely! I bought one for my wife and she loves it too! Super satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Larson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for packing all your toiletries and more
customer_reviews.text: This toiletry bag is amazing. I took it on my 3 week honeymoon and it fit everything I needed magically and truly packed flat making it possible for me to travel with only a carry-on. I was able to fit all of my necessary toiletries, first aid, nail care and all my needed makeup and brushes and it helped me keep everything very organized. I cannot recommend this bag enough.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel!
customer_reviews.text: I like the kit. The hanging hook though is made of plastic and I am not sure how long it will last with a full bag hanging from it. It would be better for hook to be metal. But I love how much I can fit into this kit and it will lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this bag. I travel to remote places for work and with all of the layovers, I prefer to use only carry-ons. Toiletries were a problem before finding this kit. I love the lay flat design and it fits perfectly in my carry on spinner. I’ve found a place to hang it with the integrated hanger in every hotel room so far, which was a challenge with my old bag. So far the quality seems very high. I’m boring so I got the black. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric but too small.
customer_reviews.text: I could not use this as I had wanted because it just did not hold enough. The fabric is sturdy and the color is bright. the zippers are sewn in securely and slide easily. However, It was not deep enough for more that very slender bottles. It might work for men as they don't use as many cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: gmakath

customer_reviews.title: Best Toiletry Kit ever, and I’ve tried a lot of them!
customer_reviews.text: Best Toiletry Kit ever! I travel a ton Internationally and have tried so many toiletry kits. When i saw this one I wasn’t sure if it would hold everything my other bulky toiletry kit held, but this one actually holds more, plus it’s way more organized than my other kit. I’m a huge fan of this design.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Larson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for compact organization!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my first trip to Europe. It was perfect! I like to be organized and it was perfect to go along with my compression cubes in my suitcase. I was able to pack two weeks worth of clothing and toiletries and had room for leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela F.

customer_reviews.title: Packs well
customer_reviews.text: I was traveling for 3 weeks and actually purchased the larger e bag...for an over night or week trip this is gret. It packs flat and has good compartments. I would suggest the larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Zsazsa

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t ram everything in
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t fit all my toiletries in this. It’s awkward to use because of the way you have to place your items. I went back to my Vera Bradley.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. The bag itself was a good fit for ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The bag itself was a good fit for my needs but less than 1 month later, the hanging strap came off. Unfortunately, that was one of the main features for which I bought the bag. Of course, I missed the return date by 5 days! I guess I will try to sew on a new strap but it's frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: LawMom

customer_reviews.title: Packing solution with lots of roomy style!
customer_reviews.text: I love the eBag items. I have some of the other pieces, but this one is the best for toiletries. It has a plastic lined pocket for liquids and lots of space and other pockets for everything else you might need. Really nice item!
customer_reviews.author: J.E. Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Quality item that stores more than you realize.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I travel extensively and so am using it routinely. After four years of nearly constant use, I noticed that the plastic liner in the far left compartment has a hole in it so I had to replace. That's very reasonable when considering how much I have packed into the bag and how frequently is it is banged around in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: 3M

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these packing cubes. This holds all of my bathroom stuff with and keeps it neatly organized. I highly recommend to anyone! In fact I bought for my sister as well because I loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Although I returned it because a bit small for a month trip, I thought it was very beautiful. This bag is well designed. I will get this one again in the larger size. I do recommend it. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Raphaella Ward

customer_reviews.title: Quality product but too small for me
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and I thought would hold everything. Boy was I wrong! Really didn’t even hold stuff just for a weekend. I will say I am seriously into skin care routines plus have skin issues so I use a lot of products. I’m going to see if this brand has a bad that is bigger because again I liked the quality of the bag itself.
customer_reviews.author: DaniKay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for gifts. This bag is all around PERFECT! I have bought these for people that travel extensively and they love it and have continued to use them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing toiletries & makeup for traveling!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself several years ago & loved it so much I bought one for each of my two daughters for Christmas last year. It’s flat & fits easily in the suitcase but yet keeps makeup & toiletries organized. It’s also adjustable in size & has a hanger fo hanging on a towel rack and a handle for carrying. Fits easily in a carry-on bag or tote bag, too! I love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot but doesn't take up a lot of suitcase space
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Just used it for a two-week trip and it held everything I needed and packed so easily in the suitcase. I also took along a strong suction-cup hook and used it to hang the bag—worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TBG

customer_reviews.title: Well made, flat pack bag
customer_reviews.text: Packs better than a rectangular bag into standard carry on roller, but didn’t hold as much as I hoped. The middle section not entirely useable, because the zipper flap opens for hanging, and thing ok lying flat for travel fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Go

customer_reviews.title: You may want to get the large one instead.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold everything so I had to order a large size from eBags since Amazon didn't carry the large. It does hold a lot but not everything I use when traveling for 10-15 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Girl

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it just seemed so much smaller in person than it did in photos. The fabric is nice and I’m confident it’s sturdy and durable. But I needed much more space than this offered.
customer_reviews.author: lblong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the overpacker like myself
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the overpacker like myself .. plenty of room for all of you toiletries.. keeps everything in place with no shifting.. but be ware .. it is big and you will need to find room for it in you suitcase.. if carrying one .. may want put it in your person item bag (ie book bag )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function
customer_reviews.text: I have two - one for me and one for my husband. We love it because it packs easily, has a hanger so you can hang it from a towel rack and easily access your toiletries, and it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie G

customer_reviews.title: flat
customer_reviews.text: Will use it next week for the first time but it's packed and ready to go. And it really is as flat as advertised. Which i love!
customer_reviews.author: skamperlady

customer_reviews.title: Flat and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom. She loves it. I've been using an older model for about 5 years now and I still love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cline

customer_reviews.title: Search for perfect travel bag is over
customer_reviews.text: I always struggle fitting my toiletry bag in suitcase or carry-on. It takes too much space. I could not believe how much stuff the Pack it flat holds. And even when full it lays flat. Takes up no more room than a pair of jeans. Innovative design. Strong material and zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Dea Rocano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the wanderers!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this travel toiletry bag!!! I keep it packed with travel essentials between trips and just add things as needed before I leave. It holds many items and packs flat so you still have space for everything else you need. Can’t recommend this bag enough!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best toiletry kit ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various toiletry kits, and by far this is the best one so far. I can get most of my cosmetics in this kit, especially if I use small sample sized containers. It hangs up and is flat on a door.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this toiletry bag...it’s truly flat, so you have to learn just how to stuff it, but it holds more than you might think! Excellent quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Great cosmetic bag for packing in luggage.
customer_reviews.text: These cosmetic bags are very practical and easy to organize. There I sd plenty of room for personal care items and jewelry in an easy to pack design.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very Small bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small bag. If you are someone who takes very little with them such as a comb, toothbrush and deodorant and a few other items then it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: HeiHei

customer_reviews.title: Very very small.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so small that even the lightest of packers would find it useless. Maybe three bottles would fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: murphn

customer_reviews.title: Good piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact travel piece. Durable and lined for easy cleaning. Wish it came in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely flat with lots of pockets. It wasn't what I wanted so I returned it. It looks to be well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for trips
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for trips! I was able to fit and organize all toiletries in the bag. It closes flat for easy packing and has a hangar, making it easy to access while you are away. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: This bag holds EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy! This bag holds all my toiletries and the bag I was using was very bulky and would take up so much room in my suitcase. This bag fits perfectly in my luggage! Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot smaller than I thought. Had to send back since I couldn’t fit all my toiletries inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel item
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this for the first time and was pleasantly surprised to find how flat it really was in my luggage and how much I could actually fit inside it! It also hangs quite nicely on the back of the door and saves counter space!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space for all my stuff and does pack pretty flat. It’s a different shape than my old one so figuring out what goes where may take a bit of thought.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Deere

customer_reviews.title: Won’t meet everyone’s needs
customer_reviews.text: This product has several small spaces to compartmentalize items. Space for larger items like shaving cream or electric razors is limited
customer_reviews.author: Linda A

customer_reviews.title: Impressive capacity in a very small space
customer_reviews.text: I used the bag for a 10 day trip. The zippered compartments held everything I needed. I was able to hang it on the back of the bathroom door and had easy access to all my necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Guys
customer_reviews.text: my boyfriend loves this to travel with it has pockets and hangs on the back of the bathroom door it is great for a guy and he never travels without it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was the expanded version, but i used it for my trip as soon as i received it, so i could not return it. I really needed this color, but I guess it does not come in the expanded version. I will continue to use the green one I have that does not match anything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: This is REALLY nice! I can fit EVERYTHING it it and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is REALLY nice! I can fit EVERYTHING it it and it packs think to fit right in my bag! I even used it for an overnight trip with my smallest suitcase and it fit right on top! Has a cool hanger inside to hang it up int he bathroom! Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: yolanda a. rossbach

customer_reviews.title: Folds flat but plenty big enough.
customer_reviews.text: Great compact travel kit, good for packing light but fully equipped with your toiletries!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Best Bathroom Bag
customer_reviews.text: I travel over 50% for work and LOVE this travel bag for all my bathroom needs. I’m a girl in my 20’s and this fits everything I could need for a week outside of my makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: run2088

customer_reviews.title: Stores flat and holds a lot of toiletries!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it packs flat. Bought one for my former flight attendant friend who loved mine when she saw it. Said it's perfect for traveling and she'll throw away her older one she's used for years now from another luggage company.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenRyszka

customer_reviews.title: Fit.
customer_reviews.text: Traveling. At first I thought it might not hold enough, but other than a smaller bag, it fit very well with the cosmetics and items I need to travel with. The larger bag would have been too large.
customer_reviews.author: M.L. Blair

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews but I love this thing. I had my old one forever and wanted something less "one big area to dump stuff " because I was always digging around trying to find stuff. I like how this has more compartments but still has a general area for hard to categorize things. And it REALLY is flat! I don't have to carve out a hole in my suitcase to make room anymore 😊
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love love my eBag. When I received it I did not think I would be able to get a lot of my toiletries in it. Not only did I get all my toiletries in it but it stayed flat. I recommend this Toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extended travel
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second one! Hubby took the other since I’ve found it so perfect for packing all my toiletries for our travels. It’s great when on a tour and you can only take one bag! Very roomy but compact!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact toiletries bag
customer_reviews.text: Lots of nice zippered compartments to keep your toiletries separate and easy to use. Folds real flat for easy packing also. Well made too.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Just enough room for two peoples toiletries, depending on how much toiletries you pack. My wife and I are both low maintenance and we can fit pretty much everything for a week in here. The waterproof pockets are very nice and the hanging hook and mirror are nice touches.
customer_reviews.author: LGrzy

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelers
customer_reviews.text: Great for people that travel for extended amounts of time. I have bought these for my friends who tour and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: I just received and used for the weekend. i really like the way the organization of the pockets and zippers- allows for good organization. It is the size of most travel toiletry organizers and as such does not have room for my makeup. So, I pack that separately.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W

customer_reviews.title: it is the perfect toiletry kit
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a toiletry kit that takes up as little space as possible... this kit is it! I love the almost flat for packing.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a client of mine who will be traveling overseas very soon and he loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: mlk

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit smaller than I hoped it would be. I’m keeping it anyway... it’s really neat!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold as much as I would like but I did order the smaller one. I guess I just have too much stuff.
customer_reviews.author: tennis girl

customer_reviews.title: Flat bag is flat!
customer_reviews.text: I like that everything fit and it did lay flat in my suitcase, the zippers work nicely and the fabric looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect if you’re looking for something that fits flat & take’s up the least amount of space for a bevy of toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: CDHarr

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I named it Flat Stanley because it's so flat. It's deceiving how I can hold so much stuff it can hold! It's perfect for traveling around the world -it's the perfect toiletry bag
customer_reviews.author: TolaNaomi

customer_reviews.title: This was truly awesome as I traveled to London
customer_reviews.text: This was truly awesome as I traveled to London. Normally I use cube-like containers for my toiletries, but this flat one helped save a lot of space. I will never use my other ones again!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: It is organized well, but much too small. It lies flat but is not deep enough to hold much. Good for a week end away but no longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This item was not what I expected. I knew that it would be more compact but really was not a good choice for me. It might work for a man but really was not practical for my travel needs.
customer_reviews.author: TWC

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised how much fits!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to pack more than I originally thought I would be able to in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Koloa2011

customer_reviews.title: Great Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toiletry kit. It packs a lot of stuff and doesn't take up that much space (at least thickness wise). I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Gross

product_meta.title: eBags Classic Pack-it-Flat Toiletry Kit (Eggplant)
product_meta.description: Color:EggplantMaximize space inside your travel bag with this flat toiletry kit from eBags. The eBags Pack-it-Flat Toiletry Kit is made from TechLite diamond nylon fabric and features a slim silhouette with four separate compartments, a webbing grab handle for portability, and a hanging hook with a convenient pocket mirror. The center section includes a mesh retainer to keep items in place when the kit is hanging, while the left section is lined with clear material to hold items that might leak. The right end sections offer storage for brushes and dental items, while two zippered mesh pockets and an elastic pocket make it easy to store all sorts of small items.
feature_bullets: OVERALL PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: 2.2" x 14" x 9.2". Four separate compartments: each 2.25"d x 9.25"w, center section is 7.75" wide
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Made from breathable, TechLite diamond nylon fabric. Includes premium self-healing zippers with corded pulls for a lifetime of opening and closing.
DURABLE & CONVENIENT: Features a slim silhouette, perfect for packing in any bag or luggage, and a webbing grab handle for portability. Includes hanging hook and a removeable pocket mirror.

STAY ORGANIZED: eBags travel toiletry kit makes organization easy and features four separate compartments. The center section has a mesh retainer to keep items in place, while the left section is lined with clear material for liquid-filled items
LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY*: Protects against defects in materials and workmanship. eBags products are made with high quality materials and forward-thinking design.
